website_summaries.verdict: Unique lid design self-vents, keeps track of the date, and stores easily with hangers.
pros: 4 upgraded fermentation lids allow gases created during fermentation to escape while preventing air, mold, and other contaminants from entering
They work with any jar that has an outside diameter of 3 ⅜", have quick-release tabs, and are easily cleaned with the included sponge brush
cons: There have been rare reports of the lid gaskets failing

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: These work like a charm! Even without weights we didn't have any mold because of the anaerobic environment provided by the pump. One thing we noticed, it's hard to pull the lid off after the fermenting takes place . . . unless you use the right technique. When opening the jar, push down the way you would a pill bottle and the lid comes right off.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Mae

customer_reviews.title: No mold
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different fermentation lids. These have worked the best. I was getting mold with other lids, removed the lid and used this one, no more mold. I have used this lid for pepper mash and brine fermenting. I am probably going to buy more of these and toss my other lids.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: When you put a regular lid to keep your fermented vegetables in the fridge do not tighten too hard
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with these lids, no brine leaked out of the jar while fermenting. They are easy to clean, put away and put regular lid to keep in your fridge. After reading many contented reviews it convinced me to buy six lids. What a wonderful invention for fermenting!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rose

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These lids are perfect. I use them with wide mouth quart Ball jars to make sauerkraut and other fermented vegetables. They're easy to clean, and I love the date dial on top. I usually have a rotation going, so I never remember when I jarred something. I've never had a problem with mold, or spoilage yet.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: These work Great!
customer_reviews.text: These lids are excellent. Having used other types of lids for my fermenting, I must say these are, by far, the best. I've fermented with them several times, (sauerkraut 3 times, dill pickle slices 2 times, and eggplant 2 times) and they have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Kingsley

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum lid
customer_reviews.text: These use the same vacuum pump as the most of the other vacuum lids, just FYI. The date set feature on the lid is excellent! This will suck liquid through the port just so you know or let expanding liquids through but keeps super vacuum tight if your product isn't continuing to create extra CO2
customer_reviews.author: B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works as listed.  Lids a bit difficult to open.
customer_reviews.text: Love how it works making fermented foods but have issue opening the jars. Would have liked more info on using the air pump as I'm not used to making fermented foods.
customer_reviews.author: Laurent Liberge

customer_reviews.title: Great product if it all arrived
customer_reviews.text: This product works well and is great to use when fermenting in mason jars. I rated this low because one of the white gaskets was missing and rendered a lid useless. Had all of the parts arrived, I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great for fermenting
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of burping my jars so I picked these up. I am in love with these. No more burping or having to worry about spoilage. They work great. I mainly use them for sauerkraut and pickles but just started a batch of garlic honey. Word to the wise though. The lid is stuck on my garlic honey, finally got it off with a hammer. I would advise against using these for any sticky fermentation but above all, they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Micah LTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for small batches.
customer_reviews.text: I have limited space, so these lids are excellent for smaller amounts. So far I have done beets, lemons and sauerkraut. Nice addition for me and they fit standard canning jars.
customer_reviews.author: Doonsma

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great
customer_reviews.text: So far I like these a lot. Very easy to use and they don't make a mess. I've had a little bit of mold on top of the brine with these, but that is probably my fault for having food bits above the water. I've done 3 ferments with these lids and they're my favorite air lock system so far. They make the process so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Craig fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great great great product for fermenting
customer_reviews.text: I love love love love love love love this. I saw this on a YouTube video and I wasn’t very sure it was going to work however let me say again how much I love this. The fact that I can now ferment without having to burp my mason jars or worrying about them exploding if I forget to burp him LOL I love this.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall E Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great for fermenting or spirit storage
customer_reviews.text: I was very Impressed by this purchase. I am using to age spirits with wood and fruit and needed an easy way to periodically vent the jars. These lids do a great job. Will be buying more
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bersagel

customer_reviews.title: Performance as expected
customer_reviews.text: Had features I didn't expect but grateful for them. Easy to clean. Month and date of packing g on top of lid ... slide tabs ... no more markers and paper tags that can blur or fall off. Will buy maybe 2 or 3 more packages.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not very dependable
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was awesome, really sucks the air out creating an air tight jar. Everyday the lid would come lose and I would have to redo the sucking just to have it happen again and again. Very disappointed and having to buy something else to preserve my herbs.
customer_reviews.author: david bailey

customer_reviews.title: So far everything I've made has turned out great. I'm new to fermenting so still lots of ...
customer_reviews.text: So far everything I've made has turned out great. I'm new to fermenting so still lots of experimenting, I don't feel like I need to worry about anything spoiling. Not really a complaint, but the silicone tends to hold the stinky smell of whatever I've made. It takes a few days to air out.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J Dona

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and less mess!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and eliminates waste of throwing out or losing canning lids! I liked how it vented the fermenting items automatically with less mess.
customer_reviews.author: Drello

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, not sure why it leaks out sometimes, suction is not much of use.
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH G

customer_reviews.title: Love these for Kefir
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Going to make a second order eventually. The perfect lid for fermenting vegetables or kefir.
customer_reviews.author: ajodo

customer_reviews.title: ... client who loves to make kimchi she was very pleased and uses for all kinds of
customer_reviews.text: Bought add a gift for my Korean client who loves to make kimchi she was very pleased and uses for all kinds of fermenting
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: More stylish than anything
customer_reviews.text: These are cool looking and the date set feature is cool but pickle pipes are better in my opinion nice and simple to use
customer_reviews.author: :Nico-Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Small batch fermentation is a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Making small batches of kraut is simple and the dates to finish on the lid is a great addition
customer_reviews.author: TheGirlFarmer

customer_reviews.title: Works greats
customer_reviews.text: This work great for home fermentation. I will have to see how they hold up, but I couldn't be happier with them for now.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Have used others, but these are easier to use than any of them! Will be ordering more for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Susie Bell

customer_reviews.title: I think the pump is just a placebo
customer_reviews.text: The pump doesn't pump anything at all and this comes with no directions to know if I'm doing it wrong. The plunger doesn't even seem to form an airtight seal in the cylinder so I'm not sure why it would work. Sending this back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Sprouse

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I made sauerkraut and had no issues. It kept the air out so no mold formed. Doing pickles next
customer_reviews.author: Kevinmliddle

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Great product that works as advertised, but one of the 4 lids was delivered missing the rubber inside lip. It did come with an extra central valve/airlock, which was great.
customer_reviews.author: JSS5189

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this product it was easy to use and my fermets taste really good
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: and I love that these lids make it easy to do
customer_reviews.text: I'm just starting to ferment, and I love that these lids make it easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: These lids makes fermentation easy. The process is simple just what I like.
customer_reviews.author: Ritchie Pewitt

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised. Nice snug fit on the jars. Will have to figure out how to remove the “nipple” for a more thorough cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: ninama1

customer_reviews.title: No response from manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: One of the lids was missing a key component. I contacted the manufacturer twice but never did get a reply. In fact, the address did not exist. Not happy...
customer_reviews.author: Helga

customer_reviews.title: Fool proof fermented foods
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve made saurkraut and a carrot and jalepeno mix. It works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the quality of these lids. Better than I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so handy when fermenting sauerkraut. Look forward to trying other recipes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Quimby

customer_reviews.title: Other uses
customer_reviews.text: Awsome product. Not using it for my kimchi just yet, but making ginger beer and mead instead. Working great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jaemin Racine

customer_reviews.title: Excellence
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product. Makes canning and fermenting foods much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Had to order a second product there wasn’t mention of the requirement to have the pump with the kids only order
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Adams

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Easy to use. -Nice design. -Good price. Cons: -You get what you pay for. -The date trackers on all my lids is a great idea, if they worked. They are so loose in 70% of the days/months that they just slid around, so its pointless. -My pump appears to be very poorly made, or missing a gasket or something. It does not suck out any air from any of the lids I have. I placed it on my hand to feel the suction, and it literally does nothing. I bought these based off of the good reviews and the price.. however, my kit must have slipped past Q&A. All in all, I'd probably purchase a different pickling lid set.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty54

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed-molds half of the time
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed so far. I have followed the instructions, kept the food weighted down and still have half of my jars mold. So upset! No idea why they aren’t burping themselves. I have taken a lot of time to prepare foods to put in the jars only to throw away. I wish so badly these would work.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: It saves my other lids from rusting
customer_reviews.text: When making sauerkraut, the liquid level raises and bubbles over. These lids have an escape bladder, so it might bubble up and out the top. Just keep a plate under it. After using regular canning jar lids left slightly ajar and having them rust from sitting wet for 3 weeks...these plastic lids are a game changer!
customer_reviews.author: Sondra

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I always lost the lid for the containers. However, these fermenting lids are not just lids but also food dryer. It contains 4 pieces of lids and a pump, which is used to take out the air. They say that it for making sauerkraut, Kimchi or pickles. Actually, I can use it for all fermented probiotic foods. One of the lid I use for dry nuts, which help the nuts stay away from the water and keep them longer. It also comes with a brush that for cleaning the bottle. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Meng

customer_reviews.title: Had No Luck With These
customer_reviews.text: My beet kvass slightly molded in these fermenting jars. Never had that problem with regular canning jars. Have not used them for anything else though. Kind of leary of them.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie Fortener

customer_reviews.title: Great for pickling or kefir!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent lids! Well constructed and hold their vacuum well. Pump works well to draw down the pressure and remove oxygen. Lids will likely outlast the pump. Also wonder about replacement valves and seals, since the lid is so solid. Would certainly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Jones

customer_reviews.title: leaks
customer_reviews.text: There was NO instructions. The lids had liquid pooling at center top and down the sides of the jar. Are there patent holes do I have to make one....Not happy
customer_reviews.author: wileen cook

customer_reviews.title: Unused syringe
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok, had to over tighten them, the syringe like tool was useless
customer_reviews.author: Imcrzy4h2o

customer_reviews.title: Hubby likes them
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband because he loves pickles. He uses them all the time. Good present.
customer_reviews.author: Crss

customer_reviews.title: Great for fermented products
customer_reviews.text: These lids work very well I approve of the design and functionality.I made my first fermented pepper sauce it turned out better than expected
customer_reviews.author: G. DeMarco's Lone wolfe bead company DD CNC milling

customer_reviews.title: It made the perfect homemade pickles
customer_reviews.text: Everything came well packed and with clear instructions. It made the perfect homemade pickles. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: moserred

customer_reviews.title: Do the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: These lids worked great!! I made 3 jars of fermented veggies all different and all good!! The lids do a fine job, I also used weights to keep the veggies under the brine.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great design and very useful.
customer_reviews.text: These lids are great! I am loving the ease and simplicity of these fermentation lids. They fit my wide mouth ball jars perfectly and make a good seal. I have used more traditional air locks and appreciate the smaller space these take up while providing the same functionality. The ability to extract air is also a plus. Great product, great design and very useful.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.text: These work great, just make sure you snug the lid. Don't put it on tight or you'll need the strength of those to get it loose! I made that mistake. Oher than that warning these are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: JasonM

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: New to pickling, but love this product. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: quality product, fast shipping. works well so far! I'll update when my first batch is done.
customer_reviews.author: Debra J

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve pickled beets and have sauerkraut in the works. Love this.
customer_reviews.author: cole

customer_reviews.title: Work great so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far, they are working great. Purchased about a month ago. Just follow the instructions. :)
customer_reviews.author: M. HERDEGEN

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They get stuck easily on ball mason jars, difficult to screw off
customer_reviews.author: Mauresa walker

customer_reviews.title: Unless you have biceps the size of the mt olympus, the lids won't come off
customer_reviews.text: Beware: when you tighten the lid, you may never get it off again. Pumping the air out also tightens the lid to the point that only a man who can deadlift 500 lbs would be able to get it off again. Had to break the jar. DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.author: Vikinggirl58

customer_reviews.title: like clear silicone ones
customer_reviews.text: They seem to work, as far as sealing, but the included gaskets REEK of volatiles. They fit other rings, like clear silicone ones, and Tattler's reusable seals, so I can go ahead and use the lids, but that was a bit much. I don't know if that stuff will get into food or just outgas, but I'd rather not find out.
customer_reviews.author: E D

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy, this item is not designed properly!
customer_reviews.text: This item was inaccurately described. You would need to purchase additional materials besides the lids and jar. My friend who has been fermenting for years said she would be concerned with the design of the lid and didnt think it would ferment properly. I am so upset that I was tricked into purchasing this. Make sure to do research before buying something that will be involved with food. If you ferment improperly it could cause serious illnesses.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

product_meta.title: AMZUShome Fermenting Lids Kit Waterless Airlock For Wide Mouth Mason Jar Fermentation Not Crock Pots,Make Sauerkraut,Kimchi,Pickles Or Fermented Foods.4 Pack+1 Pump(Black)
feature_bullets: ❤ UPGRADED FERMENTATION LID - Highest quality,food grade material, Bpa-free. Automatic Venting: carbon dioxide escapes from the vent.self-venting jars eliminate the worry about things exploding. oxygen cannot enter.included a extractor pump to suck out the oxygen during the later stages of your ferments.
❤ DATE TRACKER - You can track both month and day,Our date setter keeps track when your ferment started so you always know when it's almost complete and get delicious fermenting foods on time.

❤ RELEASE TAB - You can open fermentation jars easily with it.what's more,we designed one hole on the middle of tab,you can hang the lids on the wall with common home hanger,save space and easy to store.it is also great for hanging your fermenting notes on the hole.

❤ FITS ANY WIDE MOUTH JAR - Will work with Ball,Kerr,Bernardin regular mason jars,or pickling jars.Any brand of “Wide Mouth” Mason jar in pint,quart or half-gallon.Very convenient to ferment vegetables:cabbage,dill,peppers,beets,garlic,carrots,cucumbers etc...
❤ 30-DAY MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE - For 30 days after the date of purchase, return your undamaged AMZUShome product and receive a full refund for ANY reason.customer's satisfaction is our main goal.
